com.compilerlab.program.statements

Class While

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compilerlab.program.statements.Statement
      • com.compilerlab.program.statements.While
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Compilable

    public class While
extends Statement
    This class is the representation of a while statement.

      • getStackSize

        public int getStackSize()
        This function returns the stack size needed for the execution of the operation. Maximum of the stack sizes of each statement and the condition's stack size.
        Returns:
        The size of the stack.
